Body:
Description: Hi Team,

I'm reaching out to you with an inquiry received from Liebherr Group Turkey team.
-------------------------------------------
Hello Oana,

We have a problem with AD connection.

Thus some laptopsa re not in the Cososys system so even though Netwrix client is installed it allows all devices…

Can you help us fix it?


Saygılarımla / With best regards / Mit freundlichen Grüssen / Hörmətlə / С уважением / 顺致亲切问候

Enver Atasever

IT Specialist & E-learning Supporter / EDP
Liebherr Makine Ticaret Servis Ltd. Şti.
Orhanlı Mah. Katip Çelebi Cad. No:17 Tuzla
34956  ISTANBUL
Turkiye
Tel.: +90 216 453 1037
Faks: +90 216 671 1682
Cep: +90 534 360 3270

Eposta: enver.atasever@liebherr.com

Bu e-posta Liebherr Makine Ticaret Servis Ltd. Sti.’nin İstanbul ofislerinden gönderilmiştir. Bu e-posta özel ve gizli kalması gereken bilgileri içerebilir ve
sadece ismi geçen istenilen alıcı(lar) için gönderilmiştir. Eğer siz istenilen alıcılardan biri değilseniz, lütfen bizi bilgilendirin (bu epostaya yanıt vererek) ve bu e-postayı derhal sisteminizden silin.
-------------------------------------------

Please advise if other details would be needed here for further assistance.

Thank you,

Oana Nemes | Team Lead, Customer Success
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com  
(+40) 264-593 110

We did not succeed to make the EPP server bind to the AD.

The customer mentioned at the end of the meeting that he will check with their AD team and get back to us.
